title: “Fair Share” and the Digital Networks Act (DNA): Three Concerns
content: A critical look at the first draft of the Digital Networks Act, examining what it says, the assumptions it reflects, and what it may enable over time. The post “Fair Share” and the Digital Networks Act (DNA): Three Concerns appeared first on Internet Society .
creator: Carl Gahnberg
sourceDescription: We are a global charitable organization empowering people to keep the Internet a force for good: open, globally connected, secure, and trustworthy.
